maqras.text: Wa Ma 'Ubarri'u Nafsi 'Inna An-Nafsa La'ammaratun Bis-Su'i 'Illa Ma Rahima Rabbi 'Inna Rabbi Ghafurun Rahimun
Wa Qala Al-Maliku A'tuni Bihi 'Astakhlishu Linafsi Falamma Kallamahu Qala 'Innaka Al-Yawma Ladayna Makinun 'Aminun
Qala Aj`alni `Ala Khaza'ini Al-'Arđi 'Inni Hafizun `Alimun
Wa Kadhalika Makkanna Liyusufa Fi Al-'Arđi Yatabawwa'u Minha Haythu Yasha'u Nusibu Birahmatina Man Nasha'u Wa La Nuđi`u 'Ajra Al-Muhsinina
Wa La'ajru Al-'Akhirati Khayrun Lilladhina 'Amanu Wa Kanu Yattaquna
Wa Ja'a 'Ikhwatu Yusufa Fadakhalu `Alayhi Fa`arafahum Wa Hum Lahu Munkiruna
Wa Lamma Jahhazahum Bijahazihim Qala A'tuni Bi'akhin Lakum Min 'Abikum 'Ala Tarawna 'Anni 'Ufi Al-Kayla Wa 'Ana Khayru Al-Munzilina
Fa'in Lam Ta'tuni Bihi Fala Kayla Lakum `Indi Wa La Taqrabuni
Qalu Sanurawidu `Anhu 'Abahu Wa 'Inna Lafa`iluna
Wa Qala Lifityanihi Aj`alu Biđa`atahum Fi Rihalihim La`allahum Ya`rifunaha 'Idha Anqalabu 'Ila 'Ahlihim La`allahum Yarji`una
Falamma Raja`u 'Ila 'Abihim Qalu Ya 'Abana Muni`a Minna Al-Kaylu Fa'arsil Ma`ana 'Akhana Naktal Wa 'Inna Lahu Lahafizuna
Qala Hal 'Amanukum `Alayhi 'Illa Kama 'Amintukum `Ala 'Akhihi Min Qablu Fa-Allahu Khayrun Hafizaan Wa Huwa 'Arhamu Ar-Rahimina

Wa Lamma Fatahu Mata`ahum Wa Jadu Biđa`atahum Ruddat 'Ilayhim Qalu Ya 'Abana Ma Nabghi Hadhihi Biđa`atuna Ruddat 'Ilayna Wa Namiru 'Ahlana Wa Nahfazu 'Akhana Wa Nazdadu Kayla Ba`irin Dhalika Kaylun Yasirun
Qala Lan 'Ursilahu Ma`akum Hatta Tu'utuni Mawthiqaan Mina Allahi Lata'tunani Bihi 'Illa 'An Yuhata Bikum Falamma 'Atawhu Mawthiqahum Qala Allahu `Ala Ma Naqulu Wa Kilun

Wa Qala Ya Baniya La Tadkhulu Min Babin Wahidin Wa Adkhulu Min 'Abwabin Mutafarriqatin Wa Ma 'Ughni `Ankum Mina Allahi Min Shay'in 'Ini Al-Hukmu 'Illa Lillahi `Alayhi Tawakkaltu Wa `Alayhi Falyatawakkali Al-Mutawakkiluna

Wa Lamma Dakhalu Min Haythu 'Amarahum 'Abuhum Mma Kana Yughni `Anhum Mmina Allahi Min Shay'in 'Illa Hajatan Fi Nafsi Ya`quba Qađaha Wa 'Innahu Ladhu `Ilmin Lima `Allamnahu Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
Wa Lamma Dakhalu `Ala Yusufa 'Awa 'Ilayhi 'Akhahu Qala 'Inni 'Ana 'Akhuka Fala Tabta'is Bima Kanu Ya`maluna
Falamma Jahhazahum Bijahazihim Ja`ala As-Siqayata Fi Rahli 'Akhihi Thumma 'Adhana Mu'uadhinun 'Ayyatuha Al-`Iru 'Innakum Lasariquna
Qalu Wa 'Aqbalu `Alayhim Madha Tafqiduna
Qalu Nafqidu Suwa`a Al-Maliki Wa Liman Ja'a Bihi Himlu Ba`irin Wa 'Ana Bihi Za`imun
Qalu Ta-Allahi Laqad `Alimtum Ma Ji'na Linufsida Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Kunna Sariqina
Qalu Fama Jaza'uuhu 'In Kuntum Kadhibina
Qalu Jaza'uuhu Man Wujida Fi Rahlihi Fahuwa Jaza'uuhu Kadhalika Najzi Az-Zalimina

Fabada'a Bi'aw`iyatihim Qabla Wi`a'i 'Akhihi Thumma Astakhrajaha Min Wi`a'i 'Akhihi Kadhalika Kidna Liyusufa Ma Kana Liya'khudha 'Akhahu Fi Dini Al-Maliki 'Illa 'An Yasha'a Allahu Narfa`u Darajatin Man Nasha'u Wa Fawqa Kulli Dhi `Ilmin `Alimun
